simulation.world.environment.hexagonalMap

Class HexagonalMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • simulation.world.environment.hexagonalMap.HexagonalMap

  • public class HexagonalMap
extends java.lang.Object
    A hexagonal group of map, using axial coordinates system. The system is based on the explications of http://www.redblobgames.com/grids/hexagons/#map-storage
    Author:
    Lucas SOARES

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HexagonalMap(Configuration configuration, Database database, int width, int height, World world)
      Construct the hexagonal map Axial coordinates: x = X + size y = Y + size
